directions: Combine black beans, cornmeal, shredded carrot, panko bread crumbs, cilantro, olive oil, chili powder, and salt in a bowl. Mash together by hand, adding water as needed until the mixture is firm enough to form patties.
Form mixture into 8 bun-sized patties. Heat a nonstick frying pan over medium heat and cook patties, turning once, until heated through, about 8 minutes total.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed
1 cup whole wheat panko bread crumbs
title: Vegan Black Bean Burger
